name: Fields
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields
description:
Fields

Represents the field names and types of data returned by Cloud Spanner.

See Data types.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/spanner"

spanner = Google::Cloud::Spanner.new

db = spanner.client "my-instance", "my-database"

results = db.execute "SELECT * FROM users"

results.fields.pairs.each do |name, type|
  puts "Column #{name} is type {type}"
end

methods.name: types
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#types
methods.description:
Returns the types of the data.

See Data types.

returns.description: An array containing the types of the data.

methods.name: keys
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#keys
methods.description: Returns the names of the data values, or in cases in which values are unnamed, the zero-based index position of values.

returns.description:
An array containing the names
(String) or position (Integer) for the corresponding values of the
data.

methods.name: duplicate_names?
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#duplicate_names?
methods.description: Detects duplicate names in the keys for the fields.

returns.description: Returns true if there are duplicate names.

methods.name: pairs
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#pairs
methods.description: Returns the names or positions and their corresponding types as an array of arrays.

returns.description:
An array containing name/position and types
pairs.

title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#[]
methods.description: Returns the type code for the provided name (String) or index (Integer). Do not pass a name to this method if the data has more than one member with the same name. (See #duplicate_names?)

params.name: key
params.description:
The name (String) or zero-based index
position (Integer) of the value.

exceptions.description:
if the data
contains duplicate names.

returns.description: The type code, or nil if no value is found.

methods.name: to_a
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#to_a
methods.description: Returns the type codes as an array. Do not use this method if the data has more than one member with the same name. (See #duplicate_names?)

exceptions.description:
if the data
contains duplicate names.

returns.description: An array containing the type codes.

methods.name: to_h
title: Google
Cloud
Spanner
Fields#to_h
methods.description: Returns the names or indexes and corresponding type codes as a hash.

returns.description:
A hash containing the names
or indexes and corresponding types.
